meaning_str.bing:
n. 条件；状态；疾病
v. 决定；护理(头发,皮肤)
网络. 状况；情况；环境

状态；状况；环境；物质环境；条件；先决条件；（某群体的）生存状态；处境；身份；地位；身体状况；健康状况；规定；条款；形势；境遇；境况
训练；使适应；调节；使习惯于；使受影响；影响（某事发生的方式）；养护；调理（如头发）；保持（头发或皮肤等的）健康；使符合特定标准（或条件）

1.en: Maybe you wish to leave soon so that you can find out the latest news of her condition?
1.cn: 或许您想要早点走好关心一下她的最新情况？。

2.en: Purchasing a house is one of the few investment vehicles available to Chinese people and is often considered a pre-condition for marriage.
2.cn: 购房是中国人为数不多的几种投资手段之一，有无自己的住房也是青年人能否成婚的必要条件。

3.en: If put a condition apt come up to say, indeed is greatly negative the stuff of path is no.
3.cn: 若是放到了场面上来说，简直是大逆不道之事。

0.en: It's my understanding there is a condition attached.

1.en: All right, come on, Sheldon. Hold on. I have one condition.
1.cn: 好了，走吧，谢尔顿。等下，我有个条件。

2.en: Well, yes. And she understands that condition? You've spoken with her?
2.cn: 是的。她明白这个条件吧，你跟她谈过了。

3.en: I told Sheikh I'd go on one condition. I'd get to bring my three best girlfriends.
3.cn: 我跟谢赫说我去是有条件的，我要带上三个闺蜜。

4.en: Oh, my apologies, sir. I wasn't clear. I meant our condition, not yours.
4.cn: 抱歉，先生，我没说清楚，我是指我们的条件，不是你们的。

5.en: Tell me, do you know, was it a condition of his bail that he not contact any of the witnesses? It was. Thank you, Detective.
5.cn: 你是否清楚，他保释的条件之一就是不与任何证人联系？是的。谢谢你，警探。

6.en: What? She can't do that. Well, technically, she can add any condition she wants. Fine. Then you hand the petal to Miguel.
6.cn: 什么？她不能那样做，理论上讲，她可以添加任何条件。好吧。现在你把花瓣给他。

7.en: Only on one condition, Claire. I don't want us to work our asses off getting this bill passed just to see it knocked down in the courts.
7.cn: 只有一个条件，克莱尔。我不希望我们为法案通过忙里忙外，却在法院被否决。

8.en: I've one condition. When Hennessy finds the bombers, he tells me directly. Then we take them down. Not you. This is non-negotiable.
8.cn: 我有个条件。汉尼斯找到袭击者后，让他直接告诉我，然后由我们拿下他们，不用你们插手。这点没有商量的余地。

9.en: Oh, this is a good one. Is it my birthday? You want help? Yes, please. One condition. OK. Take all the credit. It gets boring if I just solve them all.
9.cn: 这个案子好，是送我的生日礼物吗？想让我帮忙？对，拜托了。有个条件。好。功劳都归你， 所有案子都是我破的，太无聊了。

10.cn: 视觉提示物？有这种健康问题。

11.en: We don't know how serious his condition may be.
11.cn: 我们不知道他的情况有多严重。

12.en: In one condition it was the blind condition, so people did not know that one beer had vinegar in one not.
12.cn: 实验一，没有透露给被实验者这样没人知道有杯啤酒里有醋，另一杯没有。

13.en: Each of us has a code for our optimal physical condition.
13.cn: 我们每个人都有自己身体最佳状况的遗传密码。

14.en: The woman has a heart condition. Think of it as a good deed.
14.cn: 那个女人有心脏疾病，我们这就当是做了善行了。

15.en: Oh, yes, born alone, die alone. It's a tragic human condition.
15.cn: 当然了，孤单的出生，孤独的死去，人类就是如此悲剧。

16.en: Medical condition? What are you, fucking Sunjay Gupta? Play the goddamn music.
16.cn: 健康问题？你他妈以为自己是桑基·古普塔么？给我打鼓去。

17.en: You had just broken my heart. I made a decision I was in no condition to make.
17.cn: 你伤了我的心，于是我做出了我以前一定做不出的决定。

18.en: It turns out that in this condition most people would prefer the one with some vinegar.
18.cn: 结果证明在这种情况下，大多数人更喜欢加了醋的啤酒。

19.en: And on top of that, she has a minor heart condition. I think this could possibly be not good for that.
19.cn: 另外，最主要的是，她有点心脏疾病，我认为，这很可能会对她的病情不利。
